name: Dark Theme for Anilist
css:
@-moz-document domain("anilist.co") {

#app,
.footer[data-v-7d20c699],
.airing-countdown[data-v-662c4645],
.description[data-v-662c4645],

.genres[data-v-662c4645],
.list-edit[data-v-662c4645],
.el-select .el-input__inner,
.el-select-dropdown__list,
.el-input--prefix .el-input__inner,
.list .details[data-v-69758bac],
.text[data-v-69758bac],
.load-more[data-v-20c930b2],
.thread-card.small[data-v-1b55336e],
.content[data-v-48261e04],
.media-preview[data-v-b300af52],
.small .cover:hover + .content[data-v-2737c4f7],
.reply[data-v-3a96a62e],
.body[data-v-35ce35b6],
.comment-wrap.depth-0[data-v-4558821a],
.comment[data-v-4558821a],
.child.odd[data-v-4558821a],
.comment-wrap.depth-1[data-v-4558821a],
.child[data-v-4558821a],
.comment-wrap[data-v-4558821a],
.auth-form-unscoped .form,
.nav-wrap[data-v-259ebbb1],
.medialist.table .row,
.overview[data-v-4e3524f6] .content-wrap,
.milestones[data-v-b5304564],
.wrap[data-v-5c6664fe],
.favourites-wrap[data-v-52aa9c44],
.user-stats-unscoped .years-chart,
.wrap[data-v-4021af81],
.filter-group .active[data-v-c8b42876],
.filter-group span.active[data-v-fafd368e],
.score-distribution[data-v-280c1857],
.status-distribution[data-v-8b143426],
.filter-group span.active[data-v-236fbdde],
.row[data-v-e2beaf26],
.header.row[data-v-e2beaf26],
.ranking[data-v-06f71035],
.header[data-v-b475b770],
.data[data-v-ead17872],
.tag[data-v-23941e59],
.no-threads[data-v-75f222e0],
.overview[data-v-6b4b3b7d] .content-wrap,

.graph[data-v-73de988c],
.statuses[data-v-045f5202],
.media-score-distribution .ct-chart-bar,
.description-length-toggle[data-v-b475b770] {

}

h2[data-v-7d20c699],
.theme-preview[data-v-7d20c699] {
    visibility: hidden;
}

.auth-form-unscoped .al-input,
.filter-group .router-link-active[data-v-039da2a4],
.el-select-dropdown__item.hover,
.el-select-dropdown__item:hover,
.row[data-v-e2beaf26]:hover {

}
}
